Package org.purewidgets.shared.widgets

Class Summary
Button A Button widget that can be activated.
Checkin A check-in widget.
Download A Download widget.
ListBox A ListBox widget that provides a list of options to users.
TagCloud A TagCloud widget.
TagCloud.AlphaTagComparator Compares two Tag objects alphabetically.
TagCloud.FrequencyTagComparator Compares two Tag objects by their frequencies.
TagCloud.Tag Represents a tag in the GuiTagCloud.
TextBox A TextBox widget that accepts text.
Upload An Upload widget that allows users to send files to an application.
